LP.heroTitle: Pass Gmail/Yahoo sender requirements in 48 hours — header‑only.
LP.heroSub: We run a preflight audit for SPF/DKIM/DMARC alignment and One‑Click Unsubscribe. You send a domain + raw header, we return a PDF with exact DNS values and top‑3 fixes. This is not definitive.

get.pdf: Detailed PDF with DNS paste values & ESP steps

need.header: One raw header or .eml (content not required)

how.submit: Submit your domain, ESP and one raw header (no content needed).
how.receive: Within 48 hours, receive a summary + detailed PDF with exact fixes.
how.recheck: Apply fixes and request one free re‑check within 7 days.

pricing.disclaimer: Full refund if agreed signals show no improvement (e.g., One‑Click present, auth alignment consistent). Results depend on content and reputation.

faq.q1: Do you need my email content?
faq.a1: No. Header‑only by default. You can redact sensitive values; we only need raw headers to verify standards.
faq.a2: Yes for the report delivery time. Outcomes depend on sender reputation and recipient behavior. This is not definitive.
faq.a3: We recommend header‑only. If you upload an .eml, we automatically discard the body after parsing and keep only headers.
